703693f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Hamilton Avenue
703693f-a.text:
Clinton Street (right), west side, north from Hamilton Avenue,
also shown is Hamilton Avenue (left) east side, north from Clinton
Street.
June 9, 1938.
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
703693f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Hamilton Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703692f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Hamilton Avenue
703692f-a.text:
Clinton Street, east side, north from Hamilton Avenue to Hunt-
ington Street. The buildings are being demolished for the widening
of the avenue and its reconstruction into Gowanus Parkway, a link
in the Belt Perkway system of highways.
September 7, 1940
L. Snerr
NO RIPRODUCTIONS
703692f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Hamilton Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

703695f-a.title: Brooklyn: Clinton Street - Hamilton Avenue
703695f-a.text:
Clinton Street, south from Hamilton Avenue and West 9th Street,
showing where the Red Hook Houses--a New York City Housing Authority
project--will be erected on the west side of the street (right).
June 9, 1938
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODTCTIONS
(2)
The east side of Clinton Street, viewing south from Hamilton
Avenue, showing the changes that have taken place. The building in
modernistic design, beyond the taxpayer, is the Clinton Theatre.
September 7, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS
703695f-a.folder: Clinton Street & Hamilton Avenue, Brooklyn, NY
